cab.content: This Document is the Property ofHis Britannic l\/faj88ty's Government.CAijitary Secret.1178\ 30rom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,2Uh November 1919.(Received 26th.)25817. 24th November. Malleson telegraphs, 22nd November:-" Following from Agent who left Panjdeh 10th November : ' Bolshevik garrisonof Panjdeh, 300 men with 4 machine-guns. Afghans' attitude towards Bolsheviks isinsolent, and they constantly protect Turcomans against exactions. In contrast tofriendliness shown by Afghans to Persians in Merv, Afghans in Panjdeh ill-treat and. abuse Persians, saying that latter have sold their country to British. In Yulatan are-40 Bolshevik and 40 Afghan troops.' "
